Project Overview

GITS-B is a conceptual company developing technologically advanced prosthetics. The website provides potential clients with information about GITS-B, client testimonials, and locations to obtain GITS-B prosthetics.

The challenge was to create an engaging website for a prosthetic company creating cyborg-like prosthetics.

I researched existing prosthetic websites to gain an understanding of what type of information should be included. The website is minimal, containing information that would be most important to prospective customers such as how GITS-B products differ from current prosthetics and solutions to failling body parts, and where customers can obtain GITS-B prosthetics. To represent the company's innovative and futuristic asprations, a teal color scheme was used.

Role Developer | UX/UI

Tools HTML | CSS | jQuery

When July 2015
